name: 3anor
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3o(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))

stmt.origin: bicomi(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3o(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))

body.origin:
|- wb(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3o(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))
-| wb(wn(w3o(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))), w3a(w0, w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w3a(w0, w1, w2), wn(w3o(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))))
-| wb(wn(w3o(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2))), w3a(w0, w1, w2))

stmt.origin: con1bii(w3o(wn(w0), wn(w1), wn(w2)), w3a(w0, w1, w2))

body.origin:

comment: Triple conjunction expressed in terms of triple disjunction. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Aug-2009.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 8-Apr-2022.)
